description:
Experience the legacy!
Your mysterious uncle left nothing but a letter in his wake, telling you to solve his final puzzle to obtain his heritage… but is there more to this than meets the eye?

Use your wits!
You will need to use your skills of deduction, combination, recollection and observation to overcome the various challenges in the game.

Discover the secrets!
While you wreck your brain on the puzzles don't forget to look around you, not everything is as simple as it seems!
name: Gordian Rooms: A curious heritage
intro: Gordian Rooms: A Curious Heritage is a Victorian escape game, where you solve various puzzles in your late uncle’s mansion in the hope of obtaining his legacy.
